name: Draw Hero
description:
Play the new multiplayer draw-and-guess game in realtime with friends and family! Over 1,000 different words to draw!

"This game is so simple and fun! Every group I’ve played it with has had a blast." - @deloreyjmi

Draw Hero is a fast-paced Pictionary game. When it is your turn to draw, sketch the word you are given before the time runs out! Players score more points by guessing the correct word before everyone else.

Highlights
- Play with friends and family in realtime!
- FREE! No annoying in-app purchases!
- Draw your own avatar!
- Share drawings with friends!
- Give hearts to your favorite drawings!
- See all of the trending drawings!
- Fun for all ages!
